titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Howard W. Pretz (1878-1973) was employed at the First National Bank of Allentown and was an amateur botanist. He wrote articles for botanical publications and worked for several years in the Botany Department at Muhlenberg College, where he was awarded an honorary Master of Science degree.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of Howard W. Pretz. Materials in the collection include: incoming and outgoing correspondence with Phillip Dowell, ES & W Mattern, Edgar D. Shimer, Bayard Long, Edgar Wherry, and others; narratives of plant collecting field trips; descriptive indexes and plant lists; references from publications; determination books; photographs and negatives (film and glass) of plants and plant habitats; and an index of images. The collection also includes botanical illustrations by R.L. Schaeffer and correspondence from Pretz, Bayard Long, and others to R.L. Schaeffer.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
